Class DatabaseHelperDM

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelperDM
public class DatabaseHelperDM extends Object
The DatabaseHelperDM class is responsible for managing the direct messaging functionality in the database, including chat creation, message sending, and message retrieval. This class provides methods to create and manage chat sessions between users, send and receive messages, and handle various aspects of the messaging system such as read status and search functionality.

      The database connection used for executing SQL statements.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseHelperDM

      public DatabaseHelperDM(Connection connection)
      Constructor that initializes the database helper with an existing connection.
      Parameters:
      connection - The active database connection to use for database operations

  • Method Details

    • createDirectMessageTables

      public void createDirectMessageTables() throws SQLException
      Creates the necessary tables for direct messaging if they don't exist. This includes the following tables:
      • Chats - Stores information about each chat session
      • ChatParticipants - Maps users to their respective chats
      • Messages - Stores the actual message content and metadata
      Also creates appropriate indexes for efficient queries.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL execution fails

    • createChat

      public int createChat(int user1Id, int user2Id)
      Creates a new chat between two users if one doesn't already exist. If a chat already exists between the specified users, returns the existing chat ID.
      Parameters:
      user1Id - The ID of the first user
      user2Id - The ID of the second user
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created or existing chat, or -1 if creation failed

    • getChatBetweenUsers

      public Integer getChatBetweenUsers(int user1Id, int user2Id)
      Checks if a chat exists between two users and returns its ID.
      Parameters:
      user1Id - The ID of the first user
      user2Id - The ID of the second user
      Returns:
      The chat ID if it exists, null otherwise

    • getUserChats

      public Map<Integer,String> getUserChats(int userId)
      Gets all chats associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      A map of chat IDs to the usernames of other participants

    • getChatParticipants

      public List<User> getChatParticipants(int chatId, DatabaseHelper dbHelper)
      Gets the participants of a specific chat.
      Parameters:
      chatId - The ID of the chat
      dbHelper - The main DatabaseHelper instance to retrieve user roles
      Returns:
      A list of user objects representing the participants
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the dbHelper parameter is null

    • sendMessage

      public int sendMessage(int chatId, int senderId, String content)
      Sends a message in a chat. Verifies that the sender is a participant in the chat before sending. Updates the chat's updated_at timestamp when a message is sent.
      Parameters:
      chatId - The ID of the chat
      senderId - The ID of the sending user
      content - The content of the message
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created message, or -1 if sending failed

    • getMessagesForChat

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getMessagesForChat(int chatId)
      Retrieves all messages in a chat. Messages are returned in chronological order (oldest first).
      Parameters:
      chatId - The ID of the chat
      Returns:
      A list of maps containing message details (id, sender, content, timestamp, is_read)

    • getUnreadMessageCount

      public int getUnreadMessageCount(int chatId, int userId)
      Gets the count of unread messages in a chat for a specific user. Only counts messages sent by other users, not messages sent by the specified user.
      Parameters:
      chatId - The ID of the chat
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      The count of unread messages

    • markMessagesAsRead

      public int markMessagesAsRead(int chatId, int userId)
      Marks all messages in a chat as read for a specific user. Only marks messages sent by other users, not messages sent by the specified user.
      Parameters:
      chatId - The ID of the chat
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      The number of messages marked as read

    • searchMessages

      public List<Map<String,Object>> searchMessages(int userId, String keyword)
      Searches for messages containing a specific keyword in a user's chats. Returns messages in reverse chronological order (newest first).
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      keyword - The keyword to search for
      Returns:
      A list of maps containing message details that match the search

    • getRecentChats

      public Map<Integer,Map<String,Object>> getRecentChats(int userId, int limit)
      Gets the most recent chats for a user. Includes information about the last message and unread message count.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      limit - The maximum number of chats to return
      Returns:
      A map of chat IDs to objects containing chat details

    • deleteChat

      public boolean deleteChat(int chatId)
      Deletes a chat and all associated messages. The deletion is cascading, so all related records in the ChatParticipants and Messages tables will also be deleted.
      Parameters:
      chatId - The ID of the chat to delete
      Returns:
      True if the chat was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • getUserIdByName

      public int getUserIdByName(String userName)
      Gets the ID of a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user
      Returns:
      The user's ID, or -1 if the user doesn't exist
